com.sri.ai.util.base

Class OrderedPairsOfIntegersIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.util.collect.EZIterator<PairOf<Integer>>
      • com.sri.ai.util.base.OrderedPairsOfIntegersIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloneableIterator<PairOf<Integer>>, Cloneable, Iterator<PairOf<Integer>>

    @Beta
public class OrderedPairsOfIntegersIterator
extends EZIterator<PairOf<Integer>>
implements CloneableIterator<PairOf<Integer>>
    A cloneable iterator over ordered pairs of integers less than n.

    One of the constructors takes the initial indices as parameters as well.

    If n is 0 or 1, no pairs are provided (naturally).

    If n is 2 or greater but the initial indices don't lead to the create of ordered pairs, no pairs are provided.

    Author:
    braz
